name: Hotel Sea Crown
address: Marin Drive Road, Kolatoli Beach, Cox's Bazar
description: Hotel Sea Crown offers a relaxing stay with stunning beach views, free Wi-Fi, and a swimming pool. Located at Kolatoli Beach in Cox's Bazar, this hotel is perfect for guests looking to enjoy both comfort and the beauty of the coastline.

name: Hotel Agrabad
description: Hotel Agrabad offers a convenient location in the heart of Chittagong's commercial area. It provides excellent business amenities, including a business center, along with an indoor pool and airport shuttle services.

name: InterContinental Dhaka
description: InterContinental Dhaka is a premium hotel offering excellent services for both business and leisure travelers. It features a spacious business center, relaxing spa services, and an inviting swimming pool, ensuring a luxurious experience.

name: Rose View Hotel
description: Rose View Hotel provides a perfect blend of comfort and convenience, offering free breakfast and a large conference room ideal for business events. Its swimming pool and warm hospitality make it a great choice for travelers to Sylhet.

name: Hotel The Cox Today
address: Plot 7, Road 2, Hotel Motel Zone, Cox's Bazar
description: Hotel The Cox Today offers ocean views, a relaxing spa, and convenient access to Cox's Bazar’s beautiful beaches. With free Wi-Fi and an airport shuttle, this hotel caters to both leisure and business travelers.

name: The Peninsula Chittagong
description: The Peninsula Chittagong is an elegant hotel offering a rooftop restaurant with a spectacular view, a well-equipped fitness center, and free Wi-Fi. It's ideal for both business meetings and leisure trips to Chittagong.

name: Amari Dhaka
description: Amari Dhaka provides a modern and stylish stay with a rooftop pool, fitness center, and spa. Enjoy a delicious complimentary breakfast and the convenience of being located in the vibrant Gulshan area of Dhaka.

name: Long Beach Hotel
address: 14 Kalatoli Road, Hotel Motel Zone, Cox's Bazar
description: Long Beach Hotel is a great choice for those seeking a budget-friendly yet comfortable stay in Cox's Bazar. It features an outdoor pool, free parking, and a fitness center for guests to enjoy during their stay.

name: Grand Sultan Tea Resort & Golf
description: Grand Sultan Tea Resort & Golf offers an exceptional blend of luxury and relaxation, featuring a golf course, spa, swimming pool, and kids' zone. This resort in Sreemangal provides a perfect getaway for both families and golf enthusiasts.

name: Radisson Blu Chattogram Bay View
address: SS Khaled Road, Lalkhan Bazar, Chittagong
description: Radisson Blu Chattogram Bay View offers a luxurious experience with world-class amenities, including a spa, fitness center, and an airport shuttle. With a stunning view of the bay, this hotel ensures a comfortable and memorable stay.
